channel.title: Cant run runserver or compiler[562]
channel.description:
Everytime i click to run my server or compile it comes up with something like "system cannot find path specified" here is the path: @echo off title rs2hd framework "C:\Programmer\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar com.rs2hd.Main pause
and i do have jdk 1.6.0_20.
My compiler does the same thing.

item.title: Cant run runserver or compiler[562]
item.dc:creator: @mr_zab mr zab
item.description:
@mr_zab wrote:

download newset jdk: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk6-jsp-136632.html

and edit those 2 and chaneg to this:

Run thingy:
@echo off
title your server name
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar com.rs2hd.Main
pause

Compile:

@echo off
title Your server
echo Zab is compiling your stuff
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/net/*.java
echo Complete.
pause

Read full topic
